Author: tolken#2655
Content: yes, that's right

Author: tolken#2655
Content: the komodo documentation states that you can/should do this offline

Author: tolken#2655
Content: is there another way to do it besides following the link on the footer?

Author: tolken#2655
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000024508-paper-wallet-guide

Author: tolken#2655
Content: It says to 'download the page' but downloading using the browser gets a post-javascript resolved page, which I don't think is really usable. Considering the footer explicitly states the fact that you can download it (enthusiastically I might add) it seems like the logical route to go.

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
download https://github.com/DeckerSU/deckersu.github.io/archive/master.zip
then go to the coinbin folder and open index.js

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: I've asked decker to update the footer with correct links and sent a PR

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: @tolken just saving the webpage and using it locally works too

Author: tolken#2655
Content: @gcharang thank you for checking. DIdn't work for me, page came down as broken html, resolved without formatting (kinda worked, but didn't) Obviously something to do with how I did it.

Author: tolken#2655
Content: _shrugs_

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: did you save it as "Web Page, Complete" ?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: a .html file along with a folder should be created

Author: tolken#2655
Content: Got it to work. The browser saves only the page source by default. Saved as an archive and it worked. I guess that's the problem with being too explit with instructions, they might not work unless you say exactly what software you're using to save out with. I assume author was probably using chrome or something. Thanks again gcharang.

Author: gcharang#6833
Content: np!

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
try this
- disconnect ledger from pc
- CTRL + f5 while on https://pbca26.github.io/hw-kmd-reward-claim/#ledger-webusb
- connect ledger
- click "check rewards"
- click the lock icon in the address bar to see if there are any connection errors
